name: Makis events, entertainment and free content plugin
author: Makis Community

sections.description: Plugin will get events and insert them as new posts to your WP installation. Every 15 minutes you will get free content and your page will be always up to date.
sections.installation: Just install as any other plugin. Nothing special to consider.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin for free?

Yes!

Who to contact for questions?

Please drop us a message on info@makis.world

Installation Instructions

Just install as any other plugin. Nothing special to consider.

short_description: Requires at least: 3 Tested up to: 4.9.5 Requires PHP: 5.2.4 Stable tag: trunk License: free License URI: https://makis.
description: Plugin will get events and insert them as new posts to your WP installation. Every 15 minutes you will get free content and your page will be always up to date.

upgrade_notice: If you are upgrading from a previous version, just install the new one and the old one will be replaced.
